entry.p: One of my favorite things to eat in the summer (and in truth all year round) is hummus. Because multiple people have requested my recipe over the years, I figured I'd share it here.

ul.li: 15 oz canned garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed
2 medium cloves garlic, minced by hand or through a press

entry.p: Place all ingredients in a food processor and process for 10-15 seconds. That's it!
I like my hummus thick, garlicky, and slightly chunky - if your preferences differ, increase the water a bit, cut back on the garlic, and increase the processing time.
